name: Hootclaw
description: An intelligent owlbear with a curious nature. Despite his fierce appearance, he's gentle at heart and possesses a unique magic affinity.
saving_throws: Strength +6, Dexterity +1, Constitution +5, Intelligence +0, Wisdom +4, Charisma +1
personality_traits: I'm naturally curious and love to explore. I communicate more through actions than words.
ideals: Harmony. Nature is a balance of forces that should be respected.
bonds: The forest is my home, and I will defend it.
flaws: I'm easily distracted by shiny objects.
equipment: Mystical totems, herbs, and a pouch of shiny trinkets
features_traits: Darkvision, Keen Sight and Smell, Multiattack
character_appearance: Hootclaw stands tall with a mix of owl and bear features. His feathered body is a mix of brown and white with sharp talons and a beak.
allies_organizations: Allied with the Druid Circle of the Whispering Pines. Watchful of hunters and trappers.
character_backstory: Hootclaw was found as a cub by a circle of druids who recognized his innate magical abilities. Raised among them, he learned the ways of nature and magic.
additional_features_traits: Beast Speech: Can communicate with animals.
treasure: A feather imbued with protective magic.
spells_known: 1st Level: Cure Wounds, Entangle; 2nd Level: Barkskin, Moonbeam

name: Ella Starshine
description: A young and enthusiastic adventurer with a bright spirit. She's always ready for a new quest and carries a small wooden sword.
saving_throws: Strength +2, Dexterity +5, Constitution +1, Intelligence +1, Wisdom +0, Charisma +2
personality_traits: I'm always curious and can't resist poking my nose into every mystery. I love to make new friends.
ideals: Adventure. Every day is a new story waiting to be written.
bonds: I cherish the quilt-cloak my grandmother gave me.
flaws: I sometimes act without thinking, driven by my curiosity.
attacks_spellcasting: Wooden Sword: +4 to hit, 1d4+3 piercing damage.
equipment: Small wooden sword, quilt-cloak, and a pouch of marbles
features_traits: Halfling Nimbleness, Lucky, Brave, Sneak Attack
character_appearance: Ella is a petite child with curly golden hair and freckles. She wears simple clothes and a cloak made from her grandmother's old quilt.
allies_organizations: Friends with the local animals. Afraid of the grumpy old miller.
character_backstory: Ella grew up listening to tales of adventure from her grandmother. Inspired, she decided to set out on her own little quests in and around her village.
additional_features_traits: Can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than hers.
treasure: A tiny gem she believes is magic.

name: Neo
description: Once a hacker named Thomas Anderson, he was reborn as Neo, the One prophesied to end the war between humans and machines in the Matrix. He possesses incredible martial abilities and can manipulate the Matrix itself.
saving_throws: Strength +6, Dexterity +10, Constitution +7, Intelligence +6, Wisdom +9, Charisma +8
personality_traits: Calm under pressure, seeks the truth, believes in fate.
ideals: Freedom. Everyone should be free from the Matrix's control.
bonds: Is deeply connected to his crew and allies, especially Morpheus and Trinity.
flaws: Sometimes doubts his own abilities and role as the One.
attacks_spellcasting: Unarmed Strike: +10 to hit, 1d10+5 bludgeoning damage.
languages: Common, Binary (custom language representing machine code)
proficiencies: Unarmed combat, Martial arts weapons, Hacking tools
equipment: Black trench coat, sunglasses, various martial arts weapons
features_traits: Ki (15 points), Evasion, Stillness of Mind, Purity of Body, Matrix Manipulation (custom trait allowing reality bending)
character_appearance: Neo is a tall man with short black hair, always seen wearing his signature black trench coat and sunglasses.
allies_organizations: Allied with the human resistance against the machines. Leader of the Nebuchadnezzar crew.
character_backstory: Formerly a hacker, Neo was awakened to the reality of the Matrix by Morpheus and his crew. He has since become the beacon of hope for the human resistance, believed to be the prophesied One who will end the war.
additional_features_traits: Bullet Dodge (custom trait: can dodge ranged attacks with ease), Enhanced Reflexes
treasure: A single red pill, a reminder of his awakening.
